snippet: After “The Wizard of Oz” in 1939, Ms. Duccini went on to appear at festivals celebrating the film.
abstract: Ruth Robinson Duccini, last surviving female Munchkin from 1939 movie The Wizard of Oz, dies at age 95.
lead_paragraph: After “The Wizard of Oz” in 1939, Ms. Duccini went on to appear at festivals celebrating the film.

headline.main: Ruth Robinson Duccini, Last Female Munchkin From ‘Oz’, Is Dead at 95
headline.print_headline: Ruth Robinson Duccini, 95, Last Female Munchkin From ‘Oz’
